metadata.name: Is this role being posted for the immigration team?

title: Senior Workday Integration Developer
content:
Chewy is hiring a Workday Integration Developer III for our HR Systems Workday team. The ideal candidate will have extensive and diverse experience building and maintaining Workday Integrations. 
The HR Systems Workday team’s mission is to enable Chewy's exponential growth through scalable HR system integrations, data engineering and consumable data products. This is an excellent opportunity that offers exposure across our multiple business units. 
If you're passionate about Human Capital Management tools and technologies and love fast-paced, multi-functional collaboration, and are excited to empower an exponentially growing organization, apply here! 
What You'll Do: 

Lead the design of integrations from point-to-point systems as well as holistic interchange services rendering effective data quality and dependable exchanges of digital information  
Identify, assess, and solve sophisticated business problems for integrating the Workday cloud application with external applications across a wide array of Human Capital Management functions, where analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth evaluation of variable factors 
Lead the design, build, and support testing of Workday integration code base including Studio, EIB and supporting 3rd party coding  
Work with business to analyze, research, debug and resolve production related issues within the Workday suite of modules 
Opportunity to optimize Workday technology for our business through assessments, process improvements and optimization of technology 
Implementation of Workday technology improvements that enable additional business value 
Lead integration testing activities associated with 2x year Workday release 

What You'll Need: 

Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, engineering, or a related field. 
5 + Years of Experience in Workday environment with a focus on Workday Integrations 
Experience configuring, implementing and troubleshooting Workday 
Experience in all phases of the technology implementation lifecycle (requirements gathering, design, build, launch, testing). 
Experience in leading a design session, reviewing, and assisting in the creation of project deliverables. 
Experience in dealing with XML and JSON data structures 
Familiar with XML Transformations, Namespaces, XSD 
Experience in dealing with SOAP and REST API’s 
Familiar with ServiceNow and Jira 
Excellent teamwork and interpersonal skills 
Workday Integrations certification preferred 
Chewy is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all Team Members. If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, and you need an accommodation during the application process or to perform these job requirements, or if you need a religious accommodation, please contact CAAR@chewy.com.
 
If you have a question regarding your application, please contact HR@chewy.com.
 
To access Chewy's Customer Privacy Policy, please click here. To access Chewy's California CPRA Job Applicant Privacy Policy, please click here.

Arbitration Agreement Signed?
Arbitration Agreement Signed Date

Deloitte is Chewy’s independent auditor. To not impair Deloitte's independence, Chewy must validate the role of any current or former Deloitte employee against any exempt role they are interviewing for at Chewy. Do you currently work for Deloitte or have you ever been employed by Deloitte in the past?

Close family ties to a Deloitte employee could also impair Deloitte’s independence as Chewy’s auditor should you become employed by Chewy.  Do you have a close family member (spouse or equivalent, parent, dependent, non-dependent child, and/or sibling) that currently works for Deloitte?
